title: What Should We Expect From The World Cup Final
teaser: Germany and Argentina will face off on Sunday for the World Cup title. Our sports analyst Mike Pesca previews the game.
contentencoded:
It’s Germany vs. Argentina for the World Cup title. The game will be played on Sunday in Brazil. Germany ousted the home country with a brutal 7-1 win in the semifinals and Argentina advanced to the championship match with a win over the Netherlands on penalty kicks. Here & Now sports analyst Mike Pesca joins host Robin Young to preview the game.

Guest

  • Mike Pesca, Here & Now sports analyst and host of Slate’s daily podcast The Gist. He tweets @pescami.
